articles.author: Sudipta Biswas
articles.title: Neeraj Chopra in final list for World Athletics' Men's World Athlete of the Year award 2023 - The Bridge
articles.description: Reigning Olympic champion Neeraj Chopra, the javelin thrower, has made it to the final list since he won the World Athletics Championships gold and defended his Asian Games gold medal in 2023.
articles.content:
The World Athletics, on Tuesday, announced the names of five finalists for the Men's World Athlete of the Year award as the countdown to the World Athletics Awards 2023 continues.
